subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
Careers and Professions
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The former players Brian Leetch, Steve Yzerman, Brett Hull and Luc Robitaille and the Devils’ general manager, Lou Lamoriello, were inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame.
snippet: The former players Brian Leetch, Steve Yzerman, Brett Hull and Luc Robitaille and the Devils’ general manager, Lou Lamoriello, were inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame.
